column1: HBT05 Western drainage ditch alongside of Boston and Maine
R.R., south of New England Resin & Pigments Co. industrial park, Woburn
HBT06 Unnamed tributary upstream of its confluence with western drainage ditch along Boston and Maine R.R., north of Merrimac Street, off New Boston Road, Woburn
HBT07  Unnamed tributary to western drainage ditch along Boston and Maine R.R., upstream of its confluence, approximately five yards west of HBT05, Woburn
HBT08 Western drainage ditch along Boston and Maine R.R., upstream of New Mishawum Lake, off New Boston Road, Woburn
